name: OVERTIME (concept demo)
description:
It's time to wake up, start your day, and head off to work! But not everyone's a work machine, so take your time, explore, and chat with some of the locals. Welcome to Overtime!

How to install: • Download the RPG Maker 2003 RTP (if not installed already, the game needs this to work.)   • Download "Overtime.zip", extract it, and then run "RPG_RT.exe"   • ...I think that's it. *DISCLAIMER* There are a few times the screen flashes, sorry. Music HaL_Bits https://twitter.com/Lost_Hometown https://soundcloud.com/hal_bits Todd Design Fish (Stage Name Lil Flimpy)

(Please contact me if there is anything wrong or for general feedback.)

https://twitter.com/jareld_
